amendment.description: Amendment provides $5 million for the Drug Endangered Children Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendmemt to provide $5 million for the Drug Endangered Children grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
